messages.title: Key Question in This Election
messages.content: One of the key questions in this election is who we can trust to best represent our area of North East Fife in the UK Parliament. It's why I am backing Wendy Chamberlain to be our next local MP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Wendy has experience as a former police officer and understands the importance of public service and working for the community.
Wendy will work with Jo Swinson to work for Scotland's place in the UK and the UK's place in the European Union.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Boris Johnson, Jeremy Corbyn, SNP Candidate
mentions.tacticalSituation: At the last General Election, just two votes separated the Liberal Democrats from the winning SNP candidate. Everyone expects another close contest this time round.

issues.brexitEurope: Wendy will work with Jo Swinson to work for Scotland's place in the UK, and the UK's place in the European Union. Unlike Boris Johnson, Jeremy Corbyn and the SNP, Jo Swinson will bring an end to the constitutional chaos.
issues.government: There is a lot of division in our politics today. In Wendy Chamberlain, we have someone who will make a positive difference here and be an MP who will speak up for us on the national stage.

community.content: Wendy has the energy and enthusiasm needed to make a real difference for our area alongside me and the strong team of local Lib Dem Councillors.

politicalExperience.role: Member of the Scottish Parliament for North East Fife

endorsements.endorsement: It's why I am backing Wendy Chamberlain to be our next local MP.

examples: At the last General Election, just two votes separated the Liberal Democrats from the winning SNP candidate.
There are only 2 votes in it in North East Fife.
It's why I am backing Wendy Chamberlain to be our next local MP.
She has the energy and enthusiasm needed to make a real difference for our area alongside me and the strong team of local Lib Dem Councillors.
There is a lot of division in our politics today.
In Wendy Chamberlain, we have someone who will make a positive difference here and be an MP who will speak up for us on the national stage.
Unlike Boris Johnson, Jeremy Corbyn and the SNP, Jo Swinson will bring an end to the constitutional chaos.
Every single vote will count in this close race.
In Wendy Chamberlain, we have someone who will make a positive difference here and be an MP who will speak up for us on the national stage.
She has the energy and enthusiasm needed to make a real difference for our area alongside me and the strong team of local Lib Dem Councillors.

Wendy will work with Jo Swinson to work for Scotland's place in the UK, and the UK's place in the European Union. Unlike Boris Johnson, Jeremy Corbyn and the SNP, Jo Swinson will bring an end to the constitutional chaos.
It's why I am backing Wendy Chamberlain to be our next local MP.
Unlike Boris Johnson, Jeremy Corbyn and the SNP, Jo Swinson will bring an end to the constitutional chaos.
Unlike Boris Johnson, Jeremy Corbyn and the SNP, Jo Swinson will bring an end to the constitutional chaos.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: She has the energy and enthusiasm needed to make a real difference for our area alongside me and the strong team of local Lib Dem Councillors.
nonPolicyAttributes.employment: I’ve known Wendy for many years. As a former police officer, she understands the importance of public service and working for the community.

examples: She has the energy and enthusiasm needed to make a real difference for our area alongside me and the strong team of local Lib Dem Councillors.
In Wendy Chamberlain, we have someone who will make a positive difference here and be an MP who will speak up for us on the national stage.
